name: SC SAFETECH INNOVATIONS SRL
goal:
Our main goal is to develop and maintain a high level of expertise through innovative RTD and E&T to contribute to the development of cyber security issues.

Our vision is to protect the future of our customers by providing a secure environment and business benefits that help them to generate further value.

Our mission is to become the partner that you choose to protect your company's most valuable asset and establish healthy, long term collaborative relationships. Our staff have committed to making information security simple in order to offer our customers a safe and easy life.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
